level.text: An order of the Division under this subchapter shall be set aside if -
it was obtained by fraud or mistake sufficient to set aside an order or judgment in a civil action;

Not less than 6 months after issuing an order pursuant to section 16-2323(h)(2), the Division may terminate an order under this subchapter on the grounds that the Youth Services Administration is not providing or cannot provide appropriate services or level of placement.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 15-261, in the section heading, substituted "Vacation" for "Modification"; designated the existing language of the section as subsec. (a); and added subsec. (b).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 2-22
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-22, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 16-2301.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 9-272
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 9-272, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 16-2307.
